Package com.intland.codebeamer.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnchoredDate
    An anchored date is a date relative to a an anchor date and is defined as an AnchoredPeriod.Edge of an AnchoredPeriod relative to the anchor date.
    AnchoredDate.Decoder
    A special StringDecoder for AnchoredDate definitions, see AnchoredDate.decode(String)
    AnchoredPeriod
    An anchored period defines a time period defined in a number of CalendarUnit relative to an anchor date.
    AnchoredPeriod.Decoder
    A special StringDecoder for AnchoredPeriod definitions, see AnchoredPeriod.decode(String)
    AnchoredPeriodPropertyEditor
    Property editor used for binding/validating AnchoredPeriod
    AutoClosingInputStream
    Inputstream class that prevents from leaving the stream open: it tries to close the embedded stream immediately when the read operation returns with EOF.
    DateChoice  
    StreamDigester  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnchoredPeriod.Anchor
    An anchor defines the relative position of a time period relative to an anchor date
    AnchoredPeriod.Edge
    An edge of an AnchoredPeriod: Either the begin or the end
    CalendarUnit
    A basic unit of calendar periods, e.g.
